name: Cats of Many Colors
description:
IMPORTANT: The original submission had an issue with the title screen; this has been corrected. Please re-download the game files and give it another go!

Infiltrate a mall to get the first copy of World of Warcats!

Entry for the Concordia Game Jam 2017 edition, made by:

  • Julie Morvant-Mortreuil
  • Julien Hongsavanh
  • Abdelhadi Temmar
  • Olivier Chrun
  • Benjamin Vial

See instructions in-game, and have fun!
